name: tetrahydrocannabinol
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a compound that is present in cannabis (= a drug made from the hemp plant): Marijuana's psychoactive ingredient - tetrahydrocannabinol, or THC - may be useful for the treatment of glaucoma, multiple sclerosis, nausea and pain. Compare
cannabidiolSee also
CBD
More examplesFewer examplesThe U. S. Drug Enforcement Administration says that as much as 25% of BC Bud is made of the psychoactive drug tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). The active ingredient in marijuana is tetrahydrocannabinol, better known as THC.The player was suspended for three months after testing positive for tetrahydrocannabinol, the active constituent of marijuana.The level of active ingredient in cannabis, tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) has increased from around 0.5 per cent 20 years ago to almost five per cent today.
